review_title: The best company to work for!!!
job_title: Human Resources Lead in London, England
pros:
- Amazing like-minded colleagues &  support system 
- Fully trained in every role once onboarded & further training available as and when required 
- Completely remote working 
- Very flexible to your needs (only need to work a couple of hours a week & can adjust to other commitments) 
- Very helpful with career development/goals as you get experience in areas of interest- eg Admin for various departments, HR, Mentoring, IT, Leadership positions etc

review_title: Team Leader Experience at Teenage Helpline
pros: My experience with Teenage Helpline has been great so far and I've been very supported by my manager. It's been a fantastic opportunity to work with other young people and gain insight into some of the difficulties that young people face.
cons: Managing volunteering hours alongside other commitments can sometimes be a challenge.
